Reviewer Commands

Learner Commands

Sub Add-in

Documentation

<ws365><code><id>C1</id><lang>coq</lang> <format/></code></ws365>

To insert empty coq range with the title C1. Then manually add code content into the range and reprocess this tag for formatting.

<ws365><code><id>C2</id><lang>coq</lang> <content>Check 37:nat.</content> <format/><clean/></code></ws365>

To insert formatted coq range with the title C2 with code content, then erase this ws365 tag.

<ws365><code><id>C3</id><lang>text</lang> <url>https://gist.githubusercontent.com/cheeaun/3720871/raw/fa8a7deb8ea648bb6dee6f99d7d7e183724d7d01/putonglasses.txt</url> <regex>\n(.*)</regex> <format/><clean/></code></ws365>

To insert formatted text (or coq) code with the title C3 with content from the internet url, with (optional) contextual matches against the (optional first capture group of the) regex regular expression.

<ws365><quiz><id>Q1</id></quiz></ws365>

To insert quiz with the title Q1 and with default weight 10.

<ws365><quiz><id>Q2</id><weight>50</weight></quiz></ws365>

To insert quiz with the title Q2 and with the weight 50 (or the weight 0 for ungraded survey instead of quiz).

<ws365><solutions> <solution><id>Q1</id><content>C</content></solution> <solution><id>Q2</id><content>B</content></solution> </solutions></ws365>

To insert solutions to enable the grading of the quiz without transcripts by anonymous users... /!\

Notes: <format/> and <clean/> can be added to most tags.
